comments:
Build ID: I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Install eclipse 3.3.
2. With config-manager install Jboss-IDE and PHPEclipse.
3. Start eclipse.
4. new project.
5. new file (for example: html-file)
6. html-editor crashes.

More information:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactoryConfigurationError: Provider org.apache.xalan.processor.TransformerFactoryImpl not found...
Are you running with JRE 1.5 or newer?

Additional info:

Platform: Linux, Fedora Core 6

"eclipse.ini":
-vm
/usr/lib/jdk1.5.0_11/bin/java
-Xms128m
-Xmx512m
-showsplash
org.eclipse.platform
-vmargs


Interesting:
$cd /etc/alternatives/
$ll
...
jaxp_transform_impl -> /usr/share/java/xalan-j2.jar
...

Now tried jdk1.4.2_09:

Another error, when try to open a file:

"An error has occurred. See error log for more details.
loader constraints violated when linking org/w3c/dom/Node class"

Created an attachment (id=74791)
Log-err after attempt to work with JDK1.4.2_09

I think I have a similar problem

Steps:
1. Install eclipse 3.3.
2. With config-manager install PDT and needed extensions
3. Create a new PHP file
4. Write HTML content with tag error
5. Close document reopen it

OS : Win XP Pro SP2
Java version : 1.6.0_03
You have this error :
